title: Psychedelic font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014195214im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font-pop-life_3494.jpg)

I've no idea what font this is. I'm able to find some that look like it, but I'd like to find the exact same. Any of you know?
author: Huppeldepup

comments.content: i'd not be surprised if this is a TAFKAP design.

This is indeed used on the 1985 Prince album Around The World In A Day.

But I was able to find original versions of all the other fonts used. So I'm pretty certain this one is also a commercial typeface. Anyone know the name?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014195214im_/http:/typophile.com/files/atwiad-fonts_5072.jpg)
